Text:
So you're going to use the MNA sightseeing plan as a
front to investigate the City State ruins.

It's always been difficult to spare Garden members for
an investigation,

but I think you've got an excellent chance of
finding out secrets we never could otherwise.

The MNA reporter said that if I was interested,
I would be on my own, and they wouldn't take
any responsibility.

And we've told the City States just which regions
I'll be visiting.

I assume there will be some Templar clues in
the area.
But even if it's a trap, this will help reveal them.

Heehee, Beta, you're so assertive! I can't picture
the old you doing anything like this.
Oh, I—
I suppose I've learned to fight a bit since then.

And personally, this one has really sparked my
imagination.
Fair enough. Do you have a plan?
Oh, well, that's...

What's the matter? Why are you gritting your teeth?
Do you not trust the MNA yet?

No, I'm not worried about that. They say the project
is moving ahead fine.
Lady Alpha! Listen to this!

The MNA has asked me to join a sightseeing tour of
the City States!
Ack, Epsilon?!
Ugh, Beta?

Alright, you two. Don't start bickering.
It's no help to anyone.
Y-Yes, I know... But, this time is—

I-I always try to stay calm, but this time...
I just can't!

What's got into you, Beta? Epsilon is only here to
talk about her project.

Wait. Are you telling me you two were asked to do
the same project?
And this project is based around you both joining?
It...seems—
—that would be...the case.
What an interesting combination.

So the MNA is sponsoring Natsume Kafka and Shiron
the wandering pianist on a tour of the City states?
Well, yes...

So the reason the MNA project isn't finalized is
because you two haven't agreed on joining?
I guess so.

So is the idea "Two up-and-coming artists in
conversation!" or something?
Exactly.
Yes, that's the deal!
Hmph!
Why are you two so irritated?! This is perfect!

Both of you can spread your names to the world and
carry out a vital investigation for the Shadow Garden
at the same time!

We'll learn about the Templars, and your work will
get a boost. No time wasted.

This is exactly what Shadow Wisdom calls "Two birds
with one stone!" It's the perfect mission!

The MNA is using you for their own profit, so why not
take advantage of them for ourselves, as well?

You will make this plan work! Both of you!
Make this happen!
Wha?!
But...!
As leader of the Seven Shadows, I order it!
